properties.Name: DC Bluegrass Union VFW Bluegrass Jam
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.
properties.Information: VFW Post 350: 301-270-8008 or email Barb Diederich at barb@barbdiederich.com

properties.Name: BrownBag Bluegrass Gospel (B3G)
properties.Venue: First Presbyterian Church of Winchester (in the Fellowship Hall)
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.
properties.Note: Bring your own brown bag lunch, your instrument, and your friends to socialize and listen to some local bluegrass gospel music. No sermons, no donations, just good fellowship and great pickin'
properties.Information: Assoc. Pastor, Dr. Dan McCoig at http://www.firstchurch-winchester.org

properties.Name: Loudon Bluegrass Association Jam
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.

properties.Name: Millcreek Bluegrass Band Jam
properties.Note: 8 miles west of West Chester, PA

properties.Name: Tuesday Night Bluegrass, Old Time and Gospel Jam
properties.Address: 1760 West College Avenue, State College, PA
properties.Note: Open to the public. Everyone is welcome to join in--or just to listen. Pennsylvania's most well attended weekly bluegrass jam. A great place for beginners to get started. Music stands OK. Admission free (Donations encouraged to defray costs of utilities and coffee. Participants are encouraged to bring potluck goodies (cakes, pies, cookies, cupcakes, etc.) for the 10-15 minute break at 8:30 p.m.

properties.Name: Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: Held at Memorial Hall (Old Harrisonburg High School). Free to the public, all level of players welcome...

properties.Name: Bluegrass Music Alliance Jam
properties.Venue: Train Station on East Martin Street
properties.Note: Musicians of all levels encouraged to come; bluegrass music fans are welcome to listen

properties.Name: Baltimore Old Time Jam
properties.Note: Slow jam from 7:00-8:00 and fast jam from 8:00-10:30

properties.Name: Elkton Bluegrass Jam
properties.Address: 20592 Blue and Gold Drive, Elkton, VA

properties.Name: Arcadia Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: Inside the Activites Bldg at 16020 Carnival Ave off Arcadia Ave

properties.Name: Open Acoustical Mic, hosted by MT Pockets N Loose Change Pickers
properties.Note: At the intersection of OLD (biz) route 7 & route 704

properties.Name: Garry Elders open mic
properties.Address: 2259 Bel Pre Road, Silver Spring, MD 20906
